statement.p: In 16.67 of the last 36 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{36}}={0.1667}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{36}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1667}\cdot{36}={6.0012}. We round that as requested to 6 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
